datoCmsKey.name: Nicole D'Angelo
datoCmsKey.danceExperience: Instruments: Piano, Clarinet, Flute, Saxes, and everything else except guitar
datoCmsKey.bio:
My name is Nicole, and I am an Autistic pianist/actor/singer/multi-instrumentalist/music director/disability advocate based in NJ/NYC! I originally went to college to be a classical clarinetist, but was super unhappy on that path. Around that time I saw FUN HOME and was blown away by seeing a leading lady wearing jeans and a polo, and the rest is history! I now work closely as a teaching artist and actor with EPIC Players, a professional neurodiverse theater company which serves performing artists with developmental disabilities, and am a music director at the French Woods Festival for Performing Arts. Thank you for reading my story!

Instagram: @nicole.m.dangelo
